dc:title: A Meeting with Ignazio Silone
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Interviews novelist Ignazio Silone and appreciates his central message of man's dignity and capacity for greatness, to the point of laying down one's life. Recounts Silone's characters who portray the message of redemption. Is grateful for the interview of "a moral hero of out time."
